channel.title: Client problem
channel.description: hi um u c im using the csk client open source which can b found in the download section. i renamed the client to make it say axscape client n stuff tehn in client.java the ip section i put my server ip. so everytime i open cliient te server ip will already be there. then i click on log in. it logs in. but when any one else tries to connect using the client using this client it says error connecting. i tried going to my firends house and trying the client. it says error connecting. so what sould i do. it seems it only works on my computer because i host the server. so like what should i do so othere people can connect to my server using the client.

item.title: Client problem
